testcase.classname: As a user of Mercury Tours, I should be able to login into the Mercury Tours website and make several flight reservations
testcase.name: Flight reservations 1
testcase.system-out: Given login to Mercury Tours with browser="chromedriver"....................passed And configuration options="VERBOSE=false"...................................passed And set maximum retries=3...................................................passed Given below list of itineraries.............................................passed When reserving them.........................................................passed Then above scenario should succeed..........................................passed
